verbose_text: Once again, using the same materials as in the experiment shown in XREF_FIG, we found no significant effect of srl overexpression on the transcripts of two genes for enzymes of fatty acid oxidation (yip2 and Thiolase) and two for gluconeogenesis (PCB and Pepck1), although all of them were affected by sex, by genetic background and by the interaction of these factors (two-way ANOVA, XREF_FIG A).
